name: getNews
description: Get latest news articles from Polish RSS feeds across different categories including technology, world news, business, and sports

max_articles.description: Maximum number of articles to return

force_refresh.description: Force refresh of news data, bypassing cache

include_full_content.description: Include full article content in addition to summary

source_filter.description: Filter articles by specific news source. Available sources depend on category: Tech/Science: 'Polsat News', 'Nauka w Polsce', 'Interia' | World: 'Polsat News', 'Gazeta.pl', 'TVN24' | Business: 'Polsat News', 'Puls Biznesu', 'Interia Biznes', 'Bankier.pl', 'Money.pl' | Sport: 'Polsat News', 'WP SportoweFakty' | All: any of the above
